title: Snowflake and Anthropic Forge $200M Partnership to Bring Agentic AI to Global Enterprises
description: Snowflake and Anthropic partner to bring agentic AI to enterprises with a $200M investment. Claude models now accessible across Snowflake's ecosystem, boosting data insights.
content: Snowflake and Anthropic have announced a sweeping multi-year, $200 million strategic partnership aimed at accelerating the adoption of enterprise-grade agentic AI. The collaboration expands access to… [+2064 chars]
